data.name: Rectangle Intersection Detection
data.description:
The given method is passed the information to define two squares.
These square are called 'a' and 'b'. 
each square has a x position, y position, width and height.

'''eg.. (aX, aY, aW, aH) // give the position and dimensions of square 'a'.

use the defined square information to test if the squares intersect on another

```Java
public static boolean checkIntersects(int aX, int aY, int aW, int aH, int bX, int bY, int bW, int bH){
		boolean atopIntersect = aY >= bY && aY <= bY + bH; // example of checking if top of 'a' intersects bottom of 'b'
}
```

* Use of the Java Rectangle classes to detect intersection is only cheating yourself.
